name: Click & Block
description:
A game where you use various blocks to build your path to victory !

  • F - Fullscreen
  • Esc - Quit game
  • Enter - Delete everything
  • P/M - Main Menu
  • R - restart Level

If you finish the game, you will unlock the level select where you can try to beat your previous performances:

  • Clicks
  • Time

Devellopment

A game made in a week as a prototype that only lasts about 10-20 minutes. This game felt like a good idea and a good concept on which to practice game/level design skills. Please let me know what you think !

Warning: the game doesn't have sound or music.

Flagpole assets were taken from undertale.
